Instruction.text: Melt 2 tablespoons of butter over high heat on a nonstick skillet. This will take 1 minute.
Next break your egg into the pan and turn the heat down to low
Let cook until your egg whites are completly set and the yolk starts to thicken. This will take 1 minute.
